name: Alice Adventure: Definitive Edition
description: Alice Adventure: Definitive Edition is a remastered version of the original Alice Adventure (2/8/21). It has new stage layouts, character sprites, music, and more!  You play as Hyper Alice, an ADHD pilot, and Shady Alice, a foolish hedgehog but surely knows how to wield the Flamedweller, a powerful flamed sword. They must face the dangers of Zlaneburg City. King Menahem and his slave, General Cyanide, are the threats in this game.
